intro.challenge_mode_desc: Activate this to get instant feedback on your pronunciation and fluency!
intro.choose_how_to_practice_desc: You have two great options to start a practice session:
intro.conversation_view_desc: This is where the magic happens. You'll see sentences in both your native and target languages.
intro.interactive_vocabulary_desc: Important words are highlighted. Hover over them to see translations and example sentences.
intro.intro_text: Poli is designed to help you practice real-world conversations in your target language. Here's a quick guide on how to get the most out of it:
intro.listen_desc: Click the speaker icon to hear the native pronunciation of any sentence.
intro.ready_message: That's it! You're ready to start practicing. The best way to learn is by doing, so jump in and have fun.
intro.select_from_topics_desc: Browse through dozens of real-life categories and topics, from ordering coffee to discussing business. Pick one or more topics to generate a custom conversation scenario.
intro.setup_learning_path_desc: First, tell us your native language and the language you want to learn. Then, select your current proficiency level (from A1 to C2). This helps us generate content that's just right for you.
intro.use_your_own_text_desc: Have a specific text you want to understand better? Paste it in! Poli will break it down, translate it, and create a practice session based on your content.
intro.welcome_subtitle: Your AI-powered language learning partner designed to help you practice real-world conversations.
